Reviews.Title: “Nicely appointed rooms”
Reviews.Author: Garden_Isle_Girl
Reviews.Content: The room was very nice; clean and fairly recently redone. Everything worked properly. Bed was comfortable. The room was spacious. My only complaint would be that a train went by at some point after midnight and woke me up. This only happened once. The staff was friendly and helpful. The breakfast was decent. If in the area, I would stay here again. Just bring ear plugs for the train and the fridge in the room which is a bit noisy.

Reviews.Title: “This hotel can be bad for sleeping.”
Reviews.Author: Paul F
Reviews.Content: I stayed here on 2-23 and 2-24, 2012A good Hampton Inn with a very good staff and the hotel is in very good condition. My advice is to ask for a room on the east side of the hotel. On the west side there are several drive-thru's that are open very late, if not 24 hours, within only about 50-60' of the hotel. It is very noisy and can definitely disturb your sleep.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: dil345
Reviews.Content: This is a nice new hotel. The location is very convenient right off I-30. Beds were very comfortable and breakfast was typical Hampton Inn foods.

Reviews.Title: “Always a Hampton”
Reviews.Author: n5130xSeattle_WA_
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for two nights last week during the snow storm. Hamptons are always dependable to deliver a comfortable room and a good breakfast. This was no exception, staff was great , room clean however they appeared to be half full yet my room was not cleaned when I got home from my conference by 3:00 pm so I went without a clean room. I would suggest get the rooms cleaned quicker in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Good start.”
Reviews.Author: l8tr_g8tr
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel based on reviews and nightly rate. The hotel was nice and comfortable and the room was clean and quiet. The free breakfast was average with what most other hotels offer. I stayed for 2 nights and was very impressed.

Reviews.Title: “This Hampton Inn Suite is Sweet!”
Reviews.Author: jahjah01
Reviews.Content: I very unwillingly booked this hotel after several conferences filled all the downtown hotels. To my surprise this hotel was more than average. The staff (Vickey and Derrell especially) were most kind. There's free Wi-fi in the rooms and also a free breakfast which was substantial. These two freebies kept my costs down over my four day stay. The rooms were clean, well-appointed and spacious. Despite, some construction in the area, I didn't hear any noise, only a very occasional door slam. There are more than six restaurants within several blocks (Golden Coral, Chilis, Whataburger, Sonic, McDonalds, to name a few). Also there's a Walmart. The hotel is very new. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel for Cotton Bowl”
Reviews.Author: joseph1963
Reviews.Content: One of the nicest Hampton Inns I have stayed in. Everything looks new. I was checked in to a room that matched my preferences which was appreciated. Unfortunately, most of the time it does no good to list preferences on the reservation since they are not read until I ask the clerk. The excuse: 'we must consider availability' is often used, but obviously they have not been considered. I would suggest some detailed instructions for the TV remote operation. We had difficulty finding local channels. Only problem was directions to hotel on my Tom Tom GPS. I was going west on I30 and after exiting to the stop light, it had me turn left even though I could see the hotel on my right. I thought it was going to say to make a U-turn, but it was simply wrong. Only took about 15 minutes to get to Cowboy's Stadium from the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Hampton Inn! It Has Everything!”
Reviews.Author: Itravel100daysayear
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at so many Hampton Inns and this one is my new favorite! It has everything! It's brand new and the rooms and lobby are gorgeous! Beds and pillows are perfect! Outstanding large flat screen TV! Great breakfast! Very fast high speed internet! Outstanding staff! Plenty of parking! Near lots of restaurants! Even had snacks and beer at night! I wish all Hamptons were as nice as this one! I only stayed here one night, but the good news is I ge to come back and stay again next week! Great Hampton Inn!

Reviews.Title: “Great new property!”
Reviews.Author: backpackluxury
Reviews.Content: This particular Hampton is simply outstanding. It's new and has a great ambience. I've never seen a Hampton this nice. And the service is truly outstanding...as in I made my reservation for the night before I meant to and when I showed up late the next night I didn't have a reservation. They took immediate care of me and credited my no show reservation and gave me the same rate. Be sure to note that this on on I 30 at NORTH Cockerell Hill and not on I 20 at South Cockerell Hill. Also, this is located in a new shopping area that has a great selection of stores and restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Service, service, service and friendliness!”
Reviews.Author: John108Atlanta
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel two times now and the consistency of service has impressed me. The staff is not only cooperative, but friendly; definitely relieved some of the business stress. This is a relatively new hotel and this is reflected in the rooms and the amenities. At one breakfast, I asked about biscuits but they weren't having them that morning. Howver, the person on duty offered to (and did) make several just for me. Location wise, the hotel is less than 10 minutes from downtown Dallas. Overall, a great stay.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent treatment, beautiful room”
Reviews.Author: colodreamer1226
Reviews.Content: The hotel is brand new; it opened in October of 2010 according to the manager. The lobby area was spotless and beautiful. The original room we had reserved had an issue with the locking mechanism on the door so the deadbolt wouldnâ€™t latch all the way. When we called down to the front desk the manager on duty offered to move us to a different room. Not only were we moved very easily but our room was also upgraded to a beautifully appointed king suite for the duration of our stay. Both rooms we saw there had furniture style vanities in the bathrooms. The suite we stayed in had a large desk that also served to divide the room so that there was a sitting area with fold-out sofa on one side and the large bed on the other. The suite also included a full wet-bar, complete with another sink and long counter. There were also quite a few lamps and lighting options for the room. I love Hampton Inns breakfast options - something for everyone. It was a very pleasant stay. I would stay here again with no hesitation.

Reviews.Title: “Bad Management”
Reviews.Author: bigcheeshead
Reviews.Content: PROS: Brand New Hotel Within walking distance to fast food joints, a short drive to various restaurants, and shopping. CONS: Rude Staff. The quality of service is horrible. Would not upgrade a diamond member from double bed to king size EVEN THOUGH HOTEL was at roughly 40% capacity. I even volunteered to pay the $10 difference in cost, but had to suffer on double bed.

HotelInfo.Name: Hampton Inn & Suites Dallas/Cockrell Hill I-30
HotelInfo.Address: 1718 North Cockrell Hill Road, Dallas, TX 75211
